name: Speedy Scientist
description:
In Speedy Scientist, you have 1 minute to make a cure with the chemicals available in your lab, before you die from radiation sickness.

Click to interact with objects such as doors and buttons, and hold to drag stuff around. WASD to move, SHIFT to run ,CTRL to crouch, and SPACE to jump. Press R to restart and ESC to exit the game.

Be warned though, this game is hard. It will take several attempts to make a cure on time. (My record is 55 seconds)

This game was created for the One Minute Jam
